home.heroDescription: A charitable, cultural, educational, social and not-for-profit organization incorporated in Queens County, New York, dedicated to creating awareness about safety, social and constitutional rights while improving quality of life for residents of New York State.
home.missionIntro: HOLLIS JAMAICA FRIENDS AND FAMILY INC. is a socio-economic and community development organization. Our mission includes:
home.mission1: Create awareness among the community and community at large concerning their safety, social and constitutional rights
home.mission2: Work with various government agencies, community-based organizations and elected officials to communicate and resolve issues and concerns of the people living in the community
home.mission3: Act as an umbrella organization to create, support, sponsor initiatives and programs to help improve the quality of life for residents living in the State of New York
home.mission4: Engage in multicultural events, seminars, educational programs, job training programs and provide other social services to the community

awareness.title: Create Awareness
awareness.description: Create awareness among the community concerning their safety, social and constitutional rights.

collaboration.title: Government Collaboration
collaboration.description: Work with government agencies, community-based organizations and elected officials to resolve community issues.

quality.title: Quality of Life
quality.description: Support initiatives and programs to improve the quality of life for residents in New York State.

engagement.title: Community Engagement
engagement.description: Engage in multicultural events, educational programs, job training, and social services.

home.programsDescription: We offer a comprehensive range of programs designed to support, educate, and empower our community members.

education.title: Educational Seminars
education.description: Comprehensive educational programs covering rights, safety, and civic engagement.

jobTraining.title: Job Training
jobTraining.description: Professional development and skills training to empower community members.

socialServices.title: Social Services
socialServices.description: Support services to help individuals and families navigate challenges.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: Direct assistance and resources for community members in need.

home.ctaTitle: Join Us in Making a Difference
home.ctaDescription: Whether you're looking to volunteer, become a member, or partner with us, we welcome your support in building stronger communities.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about Hollis Jamaica Friends and Family Inc. and our commitment to building stronger, more empowered communities.
about.story1: Hollis Jamaica Friends and Family Inc. was founded with a clear vision: to create a nonprofit organization that would serve as a bridge between the community and the resources, rights, and opportunities they deserve. Our organization was born from a recognition that many community members needed better access to information about their rights, safety resources, and support systems.
about.story2: What started as a grassroots initiative has grown into a recognized charitable organization that collaborates with government agencies, community leaders, and residents to address pressing community concerns. We believe that informed, empowered communities are the foundation of a thriving society.
about.missionIntro: HOLLIS JAMAICA FRIENDS AND FAMILY INC. is a socio-economic and community development organization. Our mission is:
about.mission1: Create Awareness: To create awareness among the community and community at large concerning their safety, social and constitutional rights.
about.mission2: Collaborate with Government: To work with various government agencies, community-based organizations and elected officials to communicate and resolve issues and concerns of the people living in the community.
about.mission3: Improve Quality of Life: To act as an umbrella organization to create, support, sponsor initiatives and programs to help improve the quality of life for residents living in the State of New York.
about.mission4: Community Engagement: To engage in multicultural events, seminars, educational programs, job training programs and provide other social services to the community.
about.purpose: HOLLIS JAMAICA FRIENDS AND FAMILY INC. is organized under section 402 of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law as a type A corporation pursuant to section 201 of the Not-for-Profit Corporation Law. The organization is organized exclusively for charitable purposes and approved under section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Service Code.
about.structureIntro: The organization has two functional bodies:
about.structure1: The Executive Board - The main decision-making and execution body of the organization
about.structure2: The Steering Committee - Composed of advisory committee and founding members
about.structureOutro: Our headquarters is located within Queens County of New York City, serving the Hollis and Jamaica areas and the broader New York State community.
about.valuesDescription: These core values guide everything we do and shape how we interact with our community.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with transparency, honesty, and accountability in all our endeavors.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We care deeply about the well-being of every community member we serve.

inclusion.title: Inclusion
inclusion.description: We welcome and celebrate diversity, ensuring everyone has a voice.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of working together with government, community partners, and residents.

about.impactDescription: Numbers that reflect our commitment to the community
about.leadershipDescription: Our dedicated team of leaders works tirelessly to advance our mission and serve the community.
about.leadershipText: Our leadership team is composed of passionate community advocates, experienced professionals, and dedicated volunteers who bring diverse expertise and shared commitment to our organization's mission. We are currently building out our leadership page with detailed profiles of our board members and key team members.
about.ctaDescription: Ready to make a difference? Join us in building stronger communities.

footer.description: Hollis Jamaica Friends and Family Inc. is a charitable nonprofit organization dedicated to improving lives in New York.
